html:
Language workbench to create Domain-Specific Languages

Releases

The MPS 2025.2 Early Access Program Is Live

We’re kicking off the MPS 2025.2 Early Access Program (EAP). You can download the first 2025.2 EAP build and try it out now!

DOWNLOAD MPS 2025.2 EAP

The release brings numerous bug fixes and improvements, such as:

  • Resolve info is now correctly updated when copying references into the clipboard.
  • The Show Node Info dialog has received a visual facelift.
  • Tool declarations can invoke protected methods from their superclasses.
  • The Feedback aspect allows references across templates of different roots.
  • The Build Script Wizard can detect and insert a dependency on jetbrains.mps.testing.

You can also check out the full list of issues we’ve fixed here.

Your JetBrains MPS team

Subscribe to MPS Blog updates

Discover more
